programme.title: Love at the Christmas Contest
programme.desc: Angie enters a tree decorating contest to honor the memory of her mother. To Angie's surprise, her high school sweetheart, David, and his daughter, Gabby, have entered the contest as well.

programme.title: A Merry Single Christmas
programme.desc: A woman attempts to rekindle her Christmas spirit, but things get complicated when her ex shows up.

programme.title: Christmas Casanova
programme.desc: A podcaster in need of catchy Christmas content offers to help Daniyal win over his love in exchange for the ability to record the process. As the two work together, it becomes clear that Daniyal might be trying to win over the wrong woman.

programme.title: It's a Christmas Thing
programme.desc: When 9-year-old Megan dedicates her Christmas wish to helping her mom Cara find love, her letter goes viral. Cara realizes that what she was looking for may have been on her doorstop all along.

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: When workaholic Lauren and her son Jacob return home for the holidays, her hopes for a quiet visit are quickly dashed when she runs into Ben.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica and Adam confront their true feelings.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: After three years of therapy, Erica finds herself right back where she started.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica learns the true meaning of the holidays.

programme.title: Romantic Friction
programme.desc: Book-cover artist Lea pretends to be the elusive author of a hit romance novel that was secretly written by snobbish literary novelist Michael.

programme.title: Write Place, Write Time
programme.desc: Paige just wants to be a writer, but her mom wants her to follow in her footsteps in a big conglomerate company. After discovering that Atlas Publishing will be sold, she opts to write under a pseudonym.

programme.title: Love at the Ranch
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a big-city reporter and a ranch owner as she researches the life of a romance novelist.

programme.title: Love Marks the Spot
programme.desc: In order to save her home publishing company from being sold, ghostwriter Becca must go all the way to Arcania with famed action star Lee to secure movie rights to the popular "Lover's Quest" series.

programme.title: The Fabric of Christmas
programme.desc: Liam and Amy team up to make a Christmas quilt for Liam's sister's wedding.

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: Maggie Mason, a runaway bride, does some soul-searching when she's trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.

programme.title: Runaway Christmas Bride
programme.desc: A runaway bride makes herself scarce at a winter resort, where she meets a charming ski patrol rescuer. Just when she begins to believe in love again, her jilted fiance arrives at the resort.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Christmas in the English countryside isn't in Emma's plans until her sister, Amy, plans her wedding for Christmas eve. Dylan, Amy's Christmas market co-owner, teams up with Emma to bring order to the whirlwind wedding.
